title: Urging Congress to pass legislation compensating the survivors and surviving families of the Sutherland Springs mass shooting for damages due to the failure of the U.S. Air Force to report the shooter's conviction to the FBI National Crime Information Center Database.
subject: SUTHERLAND SPRINGS, COMMUNITY OF (G0588)
